original_title: En la Ventana - el diario de una mujer joven
overview: Season over season, a young woman looks upon her window the birds, the city, the snow, the night…  Current news arrive, enter the personal story and start a dialog with it, interrogating the relations between the private story and universal history.  This diary is also an observation of time passing by and the cycles of life ; growth, wounds, healing, aging, death and birth.
title: At The Window - a young woman’s diary
